about_the_game:
This Demo is like a miniature version of our full game. It contains five puzzles and one sandbox level.

In Puzzle Mode, you get a select number of blocks and you have to figure out how to get all marbles to the finish.

In Sandbox Mode, you get to experiment with almost every puzzle piece that's also available in the full version.
